profile.name: Siraj Raval
profile.headline: Transforming Tech with AI & Machine Learning | Remote Senior Software Engineer at Accenture
profile.summary: Highly adaptable and innovative developer with a passion for machine learning, open-source development, and quantum computing. Proven track record of delivering impactful projects and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
profile.company: Based on Siraj Raval's tech stack and location as "Remote", I would recommend Accenture

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Accenture (Remote)
description: Developed AI-powered solutions for clients across various industries, leveraging Python, Jupyter Notebook, and TypeScript.
Collaborated with teams to design and implement machine learning models for predictive analytics and natural language processing.
Conducted code reviews and ensured adherence to best practices, contributing to the company's overall quality and efficiency.

experience.title: Freelance Developer (2020-2022)
description: Worked on various open-source projects, including O1-nano, Veritas-AI-for-Compliance, and neuro-analyst-os.
Contributed to the development of AI-powered tools for music composition and scientific discovery.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer (2018-2020)
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, ensuring their stability and security.
Collaborated with other developers to resolve issues and improve the overall quality of the codebase.

experience.title: Research Assistant (Summer 2017)
description: Assisted in the development of AI-powered tools for scientific discovery, working closely with a team of researchers and engineers.

points: Supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms (K-Means, PCA)
Natural language processing techniques (NLP, Text Analysis)
